titleStmt.title: Epigrames Serued out in 52. seuerall dishes for euery man to tast without surfeting. By I.C. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Jo., fl. 1614.
Can, John, fl. 1604, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Elde, for W. C[otton] and are to be solde at his shop neere vnto Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: "Fyftie Epigrams written by J Cooke gent" ent. to W. Cotton 22 my 1604--STC.
Sometimes also attributed to John Can.--STC.
Publisher's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 7609 on UMI microfilm, reel 1133.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 883 #8 and at reel 1133 #2 (Bodleian Library copy filmed twice).
